lyrics.ChnStr: 阳光下的泡沫 是彩色的
lyrics.EngStr: The bubbles under the sunshine are colorful

lyrics.ChnStr: 就像被骗的我 是幸福的
lyrics.EngStr: Just like me, deceived, but happy

lyrics.ChnStr: 追究什么对错 你的谎言 基于你还爱我
lyrics.EngStr: No need to argue about right or wrong, your lies are based on the fact that you still love me

lyrics.ChnStr: 美丽的泡沫 虽然一刹花火
lyrics.EngStr: The beautiful bubbles, though fleeting like fireworks

lyrics.ChnStr: 你所有承诺 虽然都太脆弱
lyrics.EngStr: All your promises, though too fragile

lyrics.ChnStr: 但爱像泡沫 如果能够看破 有什么难过
lyrics.EngStr: But love is like bubbles, if you can see through it, what's there to be sad about

lyrics.ChnStr: 早该知道泡沫 一触就破
lyrics.EngStr: I should have known, bubbles break with a touch

lyrics.ChnStr: 就像已伤的心 不胜折磨
lyrics.EngStr: Just like a wounded heart, unable to bear the torment

lyrics.ChnStr: 也不是谁的错 谎言再多 基于你还爱我
lyrics.EngStr: It's no one's fault, no matter how many lies, they are based on the fact that you still love me

lyrics.ChnStr: 美丽的泡沫 虽然一刹花火
lyrics.EngStr: The beautiful bubbles, though fleeting like fireworks

lyrics.ChnStr: 你所有承诺 虽然都太脆弱
lyrics.EngStr: All your promises, though too fragile

lyrics.ChnStr: 爱本是泡沫 如果能够看破 有什么难过
lyrics.EngStr: Love is bubbles, if you can see through it, what's there to be sad about

lyrics.ChnStr: 再美的花朵 盛开过就凋落
lyrics.EngStr: No matter how beautiful the flowers are, they bloom and then fall

lyrics.ChnStr: 再亮眼的星 一闪过就坠落
lyrics.EngStr: No matter how bright the stars are, they fall after a flash

lyrics.ChnStr: 爱本是泡沫 如果能够看破 有什么难过
lyrics.EngStr: Love is bubbles, if you can see through it, what's there to be sad about

lyrics.ChnStr: 为什么难过 有什么难过 为什么难过
lyrics.EngStr: Why be sad, what is there to be sad about, why be sad

lyrics.ChnStr: 全都是泡沫 只一刹的花火
lyrics.EngStr: It's all bubbles, just a fleeting moment of fireworks

lyrics.ChnStr: 你所有承诺 全部都太脆弱
lyrics.EngStr: All your promises, they're all too fragile

lyrics.ChnStr: 而你的轮廓 怪我没有看破 才如此难过
lyrics.EngStr: And your silhouette, I blame myself for not seeing through it, that's why I'm so sad

lyrics.ChnStr: 相爱的把握 要如何再搜索
lyrics.EngStr: How can I search for the grasp of love again

lyrics.ChnStr: 相拥著寂寞 难道就不寂寞
lyrics.EngStr: Embracing loneliness, does that mean it's no longer lonely

lyrics.ChnStr: 爱本是泡沫 怪我没有看破 才如此难过
lyrics.EngStr: Love is bubbles, I blame myself for not seeing through it, that's why I'm so sad

lyrics.ChnStr: 在雨下的泡沫 一触就破
lyrics.EngStr: Bubbles under the rain break with a touch

lyrics.ChnStr: 当初炽热的心 早已沉没
lyrics.EngStr: The once burning heart has long sunk

lyrics.ChnStr: 说什么你爱我 如果骗我 我宁愿你沉默
lyrics.EngStr: Saying you love me, but if you lie, I'd rather you remain silent
